name: TextSelectionToolbarTextButton
desc: A button styled like a Material native Android text selection menu button.

fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.TextSelectionToolbarTextButton.onPressed} Called when this button is pressed. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: The alignment of the button's child.
